h1: Creating Visual Solutions that Inspire the World

ace-and-tate.title: Reflecting Style: Web Design for Ace and Tate
ace-and-tate.p: Designed with the latest trends in design and user interface in mind, our web design transforms Ace and Tate's online presence into a source of inspiration and comfort for visitors.

xtrafit.title: Xtrafit: Feel extra. Feel good.
xtrafit.p: Designed a new look for the Xtrafit gym app to make it easier to use, with a modern and easy-to-understand layout. Added colorful images and made it simple to find workouts and other gym services, making it more enjoyable for users.

flowtech.title: Flowtech Brand Identity
flowtech.p: I developed the brand identity for Flowtech. In this project, I created the logo, packaging design, landing page, and Instagram page. My goal is to design a visual style that highlights the modern, elegant, and functional aspects of Flowtech products.

paysera.title: Paysera New Corporate Identity
paysera.p: I created a new brand identity for Paysera, redesigning the logo, business cards, and bank card. Additionally, I revamped the banking app, banners, and landing page to reflect a fresh, cohesive look.

illustrations.title: Illustrations bringing ideas to life
illustrations.p: Illustrations embody unique visuals. I create illustrations that depict the essence of your idea or product.

graphic.p: Developing scalable, cohesive visual elements that maintain a consistent and polished brand identity across various platforms and projects.

illustration.p: Creative illustrations that enhance storytelling, add visual interest, and align with brand identity.

ui.title: UI Design

about.title: About me
about.p1: Hi there! I'm Ivan, a UX/UI designer, graphic designer, and illustrator with extensive experience in creating unique and effective visual solutions. I specialize in making brands and products stand out by designing user-friendly interfaces that are both intuitive and eye-catching.
about.p2: I started my career in graphic design, crafting attractive logos and corporate identities for various companies. Over time, I shifted my focus to UX/UI design, where I design interfaces that are not only easy to use but also visually appealing. I'm also passionate about illustration, which allows me to express my creativity and inspiration through visual art.
about.p3: My goal is to not just complete projects, but to inspire my clients and users alike with each design I create.

testimonials.title: Hear it about me from my co-workers

review1.name: - Krisitna B. - Front-End Developer
review1.p: I've had the pleasure of working closely with Ivan on several UX/UI design projects. His ability to balance beauty with functionality consistently impressed me. As a developer, I appreciated how his user-centric designs made my job easier, resulting in visually stunning and intuitive websites. Beyond UX/UI, Ivan’s graphic design and artistic skills are outstanding. He consistently delivers creative and polished work. He’s a talented designer and artist with a passion for creating exceptional visual experiences, and I highly recommend him.

review2.name: -Tetiana V. - UX / UI Designer
review2.p: Working with Ivan on projects has been a fantastic experience. His design skills always stand out. He’s not just skilled in UX/UI but also brings strong graphic design expertise to the table, which adds depth to the product and elevates the overall customer experience. Collaborating with Ivan has been inspiring, and I look forward to creating more great work together!
